summary.para: Gets the thumbnail stream. This method is for internal use only and can only be called by the photos application.

param.name: options
param.para: The cache options for the thumbnail stream.

param.name: requestedThumbnailSize
param.para: The requested size of the thumbnail.

param.name: thumbnailSize
param.para: The actual size of the returned thumbnail.

returns.para: If this method succeeds, it returns S_OK. Otherwise, it returns an HRESULT error code.

summary.para: Sets the thumbnail stream. This method is for internal use only and can only be called by the photos application.

param.name: thumbnailStream
param.para: The pointer to the thumbnail stream.

returns.para: If this method succeeds, it returns S_OK. Otherwise, it returns an HRESULT error code.

summary.para: Gets or sets the thumbnail stream. This interface is for internal use only and can only be called by the photos application.
